about_the_game:
Welcome to HostageHub, the ultimate gig economy experience that puts you and your friends at the forefront of daring hostage rescues! As a freelance operative in the high-stakes world of hostage rescue, your objective is simple: eliminate the baddies, earn the cash, and save the captives.

Key Features


Co-op Action
Friendship is forged in the flames of hostage rescue. Team up with up to 5 other players to bring the hostages home.

Wave-based Gameplay
Dive into intense hostage rescue missions that escalate in challenge and intensity with each wave. Adapt to changing situations, employ strategic positioning, and choose your approach carefully to ensure success.

Earn to Progress
Every successful rescue mission earns you cold hard cash. Use your earnings to purchase an arsenal of weapons, gear, and game-changing abilities that will enhance your team's performance and keep you one step ahead of the baddies.

Strategic Budgeting
But it's not all about firepower – you've got bills to pay! Manage your earnings smartly to cover your necessities. Balancing your expenses with your firepower is crucial to your survival.

HostageHub offers a unique blend of cooperative gameplay, strategic decision-making, and heart-pounding action. Gather your team, gear up, and step into a world where every rescue mission could be your last chance to make a difference. The clock is ticking, and lives are on the line – will you rise to the challenge?
